Poll For Keyboard.description: Polls keyboard instead of making a Windows hotkey. Could fix hotkeys not responding in some cases, like while gaming, but is more resource-intensive. Default: false

Polling Rate.description: Polling rate for keyboard in seconds if Poll For Keyboard is on. Default: 0.1

Stop All Sounds With New Sound.description: Stops all sounds if a new sound plays. Default: false

Number Of Streams.description: The maximum number of layers of sounds. Default: 3

Delay Before New Sound Can Play.description: Prevents sounds from playing in a rapid-fire fashion. Default: 0.25

Chunk Size.description: As I understand it, a buffer for pyAudio. This program defaults it to 2048. PyAudio defaulted it to 1024
